metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43281 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Double Free vulnerability in Nothings Stb Image.h v.2.28 allows a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted file to thestbi_load_gif_main function.

criterions.comment: emscripten package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
libsfml package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
love package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
mame package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
visp package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
